Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by Wisconsin in 1978...
Injured on 8/19/1981 with a Blister On Finger, out for 5 days...
Traded from Wisconsin to Pittsburgh on 7/21/1982 (Going to WIS: C J. Bustillos, CF G. Albino, P R. Gallegos. Going to PIT: RF J. Cardella, 2B A. Gies, P A. Zamora, C S. Nolan)...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/16/1983, off Alvin Keough (Mal)...
